channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked& Foul Smelling Kerb Gully, 16th July
item.description:
The Kerb Gully is directly outside of 27 Moorend Crescent. Severn Trent has looked at it and say it is blocked and a Highways responsibility. You can contact me in advance if access to the gully is needed at a particular time, as there may be a parked car over the gully.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Moorend Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 16th July
item.description:
Broken lefthand side ped crossing drop 900mm kerb, replace. Standard TM - 28 Days (FW Kerbing Defects)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: General road markings, lines and stud issues problem, 16th July
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet
